text: K nim prishlo nakazaniye v vide oblakov. Kogda adity uvideli na gorizonte oblaka, napravlyayushchiyesya k ikh dolinam, oni, likuya, skazali: "Eto oblaka, kotoryye prinesut nam dozhd' i blago". Im bylo skazano: "Net! Eto - to, chto vy toropili, - vikhr', nesushchiy vam muchitel'neysheye nakazaniye
